/*
jai shree ram _/\_
A hacker from NITP
*/

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define mod 1000000007
typedef set<string> ss;
typedef vector<int> vs;
typedef map<int,char> msi;
typedef pair<int,int> pa;
typedef long long int ll;

ll n,m,x,a,c[100004],sum[100004],i,ans;
int main()
{
	//freopen("i.in", "r", stdin);
  	//freopen("o.out", "w", stdout);
  	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m>>x;
		memset(c,0,sizeof(c));
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a;
			c[a%m]++;
		}
		sum[0]=0;
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		sum[i+1]=sum[i]+c[i];
		ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<=x;i++)
		ans+=c[i]*(sum[x-i+1]+sum[m]-sum[m-i]);
		for(i=x+1;i<m;i++)
		ans+=c[i]*(sum[m+x-i+1]-sum[m-i]);
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
